```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(waffle)
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
```

## Waffle charts for Australian parliament

```{r}
a <- waffle(c(thing1 = 0, thing2 = 100), rows = 4, keep = FALSE),
speaker <- waffle(c(thing1 = 1, thing2 = 0), rows = 1, keep=FALSE, size = 0.01, pad = 40),
five <-   waffle(c(thing1 = 5, thing2 = 0), rows = 1, keep=FALSE, size = 0.01, pad = 40),
b <- waffle(c(thing1 = 25, thing2 = 75), rows = 4, keep = FALSE)


```
